Team4450.Lib

Class SRXMagneticEncoderRelative

  • java.lang.Object
    • Team4450.Lib.SRXMagneticEncoderRelative
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.CounterBase, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDSource

    public class SRXMagneticEncoderRelative
extends java.lang.Object
implements edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.CounterBase, edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDSource
    Wrapper for SRX Magnetic Encoder used in relative (quadrature) mode.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  SRXMagneticEncoderRelative.PIDRateType
      When using PID Source Type of rate, selects which rate measurement to use.

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.CounterBase

        public void setPIDSourceType(edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.PIDSourceType pidSourceType)

        Specified by:

        public double pidGet()
        Return the cumulative encoder count since last reset for input to a pid controller, or return the current rate of change of the encoder (velocity).

        Returns:

      • get

        public int get()
        Return the encoder count since last reset. Note: 4096 counts per encoder revolution divided by the scale factor.
        Specified by:
        get in interface edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.CounterBase
        Returns:
        The encoder count.

      • getDistance

        public double getDistance()
        Return the distance in inches the encoder has recorded since last reset. If encoder goes backwards the distance is reduced. Computed from encoder rotations x gear ratio factor x (wheel diameter x 3.14).
        Returns:
        The distance in inches.

      • reset

        Reset the encoder count.

      • getStopped

        public boolean getStopped()
        Return if robot is stopped. No movement for Max Period seconds.
        Specified by:
        getStopped in interface edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.CounterBase
        Returns:

      • getDirection

        public boolean getDirection()
        Return direction of encoder movement. Assumes positive encoder counting as indicating the "forward" direction of the robot.
        Specified by:
        getDirection in interface edu.wpi.first.wpilibj.CounterBase
        Returns:
        The direction (true = forward, false = backward).

      • setGearRatio

        public void setGearRatio(double gearRatio)
        Set the gear ratio factor. This is a factor that the encoder rotation is multiplied by to yield the wheel rotation. Defaults to 1 meaning a 1:1 ratio between encoder shaft revolutions and wheel revolutions.
        Parameters:
        gearRatio - The gear ratio factor to set

      • getScaleFactor

        public int getScaleFactor()
        Returns current encoder count scale factor.
        Returns:
        The scale factor

      • setScaleFactor

        public void setScaleFactor(int scaleFactor)
        Set scaling factor that encoder counts will be divided by to reduce encoder count range.
        Parameters:
        scaleFactor - The scale factor to set.
